sql-statements.statement: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT gpci_id, TO_CHAR(eff_begin_date, 'MM/DD/YYYY'), TO_CHAR(eff_end_date, 'MM/DD/YYYY'), locality_name, state, county FROM ref_gpci WHERE UPPER(carrier_number) LIKE UPPER(?) AND eff_begin_date <= to_date(?, 'MM/DD/YYYY') AND eff_end_date >= to_date(?, 'MM/DD/YYYY') ORDER BY state, locality_name ) WHERE rownum <= 250

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT gpci_id, TO_CHAR(eff_begin_date, 'MM/DD/YYYY'), TO_CHAR(eff_end_date, 'MM/DD/YYYY'), locality_name, state, county FROM ref_gpci WHERE UPPER(county) LIKE UPPER(?) AND eff_begin_date <= to_date(?, 'MM/DD/YYYY') AND eff_end_date >= to_date(?, 'MM/DD/YYYY') ORDER BY state, locality_name ) WHERE rownum <= 250

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT gpci_id, TO_CHAR(eff_begin_date, 'MM/DD/YYYY'), TO_CHAR(eff_end_date, 'MM/DD/YYYY'), locality_name, state, county FROM ref_gpci WHERE gpci_id like ? AND eff_begin_date <= to_date(?, 'MM/DD/YYYY') AND eff_end_date >= to_date(?, 'MM/DD/YYYY') ORDER BY state, locality_name ) WHERE rownum <= 250

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT gpci_id, TO_CHAR(eff_begin_date, 'MM/DD/YYYY'), TO_CHAR(eff_end_date, 'MM/DD/YYYY'), locality_name, state, county FROM ref_gpci WHERE UPPER(locality_name) LIKE UPPER(?) AND eff_begin_date <= to_date(?, 'MM/DD/YYYY') AND eff_end_date >= to_date(?, 'MM/DD/YYYY') ORDER BY state, locality_name ) WHERE rownum <= 250

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT gpci_id, TO_CHAR(eff_begin_date, 'MM/DD/YYYY'), TO_CHAR(eff_end_date, 'MM/DD/YYYY'), locality_name, state, county FROM ref_gpci WHERE LTRIM(RTRIM(UPPER(state))) LIKE UPPER(?)
